data.title: Albert Pujols Stats, Age, Position, Height, Weight, Fantasy & News
data.meta_description: Albert Pujols Stats, Age, Position, Height, Weight, Fantasy & News
data.text: November 1, 2022 1B Albert Pujols retired. July 18, 2022 1B Albert Pujols assigned to National League All-Stars. March 28, 2022 St. Louis Cardinals signed free agent 1B Albert Pujols. March 28, 2022 St. Louis Cardinals activated 1B Albert Pujols. November 3, 2021 1B Albert Pujols elected free agency. October 31, 2021 1B Albert Pujols assigned to Leones del Escogido. October 30, 2021 1B Albert Pujols assigned to Leones del Escogido. September 29, 2021 Los Angeles Dodgers activated 1B Albert Pujols from the 10-day injured list. September 28, 2021 Los Angeles Dodgers placed 1B Albert Pujols on the 10-day injured list. May 17, 2021 Los Angeles Dodgers signed free agent 1B Albert Pujols. May 17, 2021 Los Angeles Dodgers signed free agent 1B Albert Pujols. May 17, 2021 Los Angeles Dodgers signed free agent 1B Albert Pujols. May 13, 2021 Los Angeles Angels released 1B Albert Pujols. May 6, 2021 Los Angeles Angels designated 1B Albert Pujols for assignment. November 2, 2018 Los Angeles Angels activated 1B Albert Pujols from the 60-day injured list. November 2, 2018 Los Angeles Angels activated 1B Albert Pujols from the 60-day injured list. November 2, 2018 Los Angeles Angels activated 1B Albert Pujols from the 60 day injured list. September 3, 2018 Los Angeles Angels transferred 1B Albert Pujols from the 10-day disabled list to the 60-day disabled list. Left knee surgery. August 30, 2018 Los Angeles Angels placed 1B Albert Pujols on the 10-day disabled list retroactive to August 29, 2018. Left knee surgery. July 23, 2018 Los Angeles Angels activated 1B Albert Pujols from the 10-day disabled list. July 13, 2018 Los Angeles Angels placed 1B Albert Pujols on the 10-day disabled list. Left knee inflammation. September 30, 2013 Los Angeles Angels activated 1B Albert Pujols from the 15-day disabled list. July 28, 2013 Los Angeles Angels placed 1B Albert Pujols on the 15-day disabled list retroactive to July 27, 2013. Partial tear of the left plantar fascia. December 10, 2011 Los Angeles Angels signed free agent 1B Albert Pujols. October 30, 2011 1B Albert Pujols elected free agency. July 5, 2011 St. Louis Cardinals activated 1B Albert Pujols from the 15-day disabled list. June 21, 2011 St. Louis Cardinals placed 1B Albert Pujols on the 15-day disabled list retroactive to June 20, 2011. Fractured left forearm.
